DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Progression Initial Diagnosis Observed Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there was an  increase in the size of a tumor or spread of cancer in the body being observed following the initial diagnosis, investigation, analysis or recognition of the presence and nature of disease from expressed signs and symptoms.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the increase in the size of a tumor or spread of cancer in the body being observed following the initial diagnosis, investigation, analysis or recognition of the presence and nature of disease from expressed signs and symptoms.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a cancer over time.

Concepts.definition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm.

Property.preferredDefinition: The first letter of a word, especially the first letter of each word in a proper name.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Observed; discovered or determined by scientific observation.

Concepts.definition: The first letter of a word, especially the first letter of each word in a proper name.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
